name: purdue-course-search
title: Purdue Course Search
description: Search for courses available at Purdue University (Updated Fall 2024).
author: rayhanadev

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Courses
commands.description: Search the Purdue Course Directory for a specific course.
commands.subtitle: Purdue

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
